help.faqSubtitle: Find quick answers to common questions

faqs.question: How do I start a hearing test?
faqs.answer: Navigate to the Hearing Test tab, ensure you're in a quiet environment, put on your headphones, and tap "Start Test". Follow the on-screen instructions and tap when you hear a sound.

faqs.question: Why am I not getting accurate results?
faqs.answer: Make sure you're in a quiet room, your headphones are properly connected, and the volume is set to a comfortable level. Avoid taking the test in noisy environments or while moving.

faqs.question: Can I use HearingZen without headphones?
faqs.answer: For accurate hearing tests, headphones are required. However, you can use the Sound Amplifier feature with your device's built-in speakers or hearing aids.

faqs.question: How often should I take the hearing test?
faqs.answer: We recommend taking the hearing test once a month to track changes in your hearing health. If you notice sudden changes, consult with a healthcare professional.

faqs.question: Is my hearing data private and secure?
faqs.answer: Yes, all your hearing data is encrypted and stored securely on your device. We never share your personal health information with third parties without your explicit consent.

faqs.question: What do the hearing test results mean?
faqs.answer: Your results show your hearing sensitivity across different frequencies. Lower numbers indicate better hearing. Results are color-coded: Green (Normal), Yellow (Mild loss), Orange (Moderate), Red (Significant loss).

faqs.question: Can HearingZen replace a professional hearing test?
faqs.answer: No. HearingZen is designed for monitoring and tracking, not medical diagnosis. Always consult with an audiologist or healthcare professional for medical advice.

faqs.question: How do I calibrate the Sound Amplifier?
faqs.answer: Go to Settings > Sound Amplifier > Calibration. Follow the steps to adjust gain, bass, and treble to your preference. Start with low settings and gradually increase.

help.emergencyText: If you're experiencing sudden hearing loss or severe symptoms, please contact a healthcare professional immediately.

instructions.welcomeText: This guide will help you get the most out of HearingZen. Follow these simple steps to enhance your hearing experience.

sections.title: Getting Started
steps: Open the HearingZen app and grant the required microphone and Bluetooth permissions
Ensure your hearing device or headphones are connected properly
You'll be guided through a simple setup to personalize your hearing profile

sections.title: Hearing Test
steps: Go to the Hearing Test section from the main menu
Follow the on-screen audio instructions carefully in a quiet environment
The app will measure your hearing sensitivity and provide results instantly

sections.title: Sound Amplifier
steps: Access the Sound Amplifier to enhance ambient sounds
Use the volume slider to adjust amplification safely
Avoid using maximum volume for long periods to protect your ears

sections.title: Hearing Health Tracker
steps: View your hearing trends and progress in the Tracker tab
Track improvements over time with detailed analytics
Get daily tips and insights to maintain ear health

sections.title: Support
steps: Visit the Help & Support section for FAQs and guides
Contact our team directly for personalized assistance
Access video tutorials and documentation anytime

tipsList: ‚Ä¢ Use headphones in quiet spaces for accurate test results
‚Ä¢ Take regular breaks during extended use
‚Ä¢ Update your hearing profile monthly for best results
instructions.footerThankYou: Thank you for being part of HearingZen

privacyPolicy.headerSubtitle: Your privacy and trust are our top priorities.

introduction.title: 1. Introduction
introduction.description: Welcome to HearingZen! We value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal data. This policy explains how we collect, use, and safeguard your information when you use our app.

informationCollected.title: 2. Information We Collect
informationCollected.description: We collect the following types of information to improve your hearing experience:

bullets.audioInput: Audio input from your device microphone
bullets.bluetoothData: Bluetooth and hearing device connection data

howWeUse.title: 3. How We Use Your Information
howWeUse.description: Your data is used solely to enhance and personalize your hearing experience. Specifically, we use your information to:

bullets.provideAnalytics: Provide analytics to track your hearing health

dataSecurity.title: 4. Data Security
dataSecurity.description: We implement advanced encryption and local data storage to ensure your information remains private and secure. HearingZen never sells or shares your personal data with third parties.

yourControl.title: 5. Your Control
yourControl.description: You can review, edit, or delete your data anytime through the app settings. You can also disable microphone or Bluetooth permissions without affecting your account.

thirdParty.title: 6. Third-Party Services
thirdParty.description: HearingZen may integrate with secure third-party services for analytics or cloud syncing. These services comply with GDPR and privacy standards.

updates.title: 7. Updates to This Policy
updates.description: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect new features or legal requirements. You'll be notified in-app whenever changes occur.

contactUs.title: 8. Contact Us
contactUs.description: If you have any questions or concerns regarding this Privacy Policy, please reach out to us at:

termsAndConditions.introText: Please read these Terms and Conditions carefully before using our application. These terms outline your rights and responsibilities when using {{appName}}.

sections.title: 1. Introduction
sections.content: Welcome to HearingZen. By using our app, you agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.

sections.title: 2. Usage
sections.content: You agree to use the app only for lawful purposes and in a way that does not infringe the rights of others.

sections.title: 3. Privacy
sections.content: We respect your privacy. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect and use your data.

sections.title: 4. Limitation of Liability
sections.content: We are not liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, or consequential damages arising out of your use of the app.

sections.title: 5. Updates
sections.content: Terms may change from time to time. Continued use of the app means you accept those changes.

termsAndConditions.noticeText: By continuing to use {{appName}}, you acknowledge that you have read, understood, and agree to be bound by these Terms and Conditions.
termsAndConditions.agreementText: These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and {{appName}}. If you have any questions or concerns, please contact our support team.
termsAndConditions.footerThankYou: Thank you for being part of {{appName}}.
